nodes.text: The SPINDLE Chamber Floor smells like cold dust and warmed insulation. (pause) The containment sphere sits in its cradle. Matte. Over-insulated. (pause) Then for a fraction of a second it isn’t. (pause) The surface flickers reflective. Like a mirror that would prefer a different room. (pause) The floor signage still reads NORMAL OPERATIONS. Either optimism or fraud.

choices.text: use: Acknowledge HOLD condition and begin documentation packet.

nodes.text:
You don’t fix the hold. You make it legible. (pause)
You print the notice. You capture the reference number. (pause)
You create a timestamped chain. (pause)
It says you were here. You saw it. You did not improvise alone. (pause)
The sphere flickers once more—mirror then matte—like it’s being kept open on purpose. (pause)
The room accepts your paperwork the way it accepts power: without gratitude.
